channel.title: Adapted homology on Writing what I'm learning
channel.description: Recent content in Adapted homology on Writing what I'm learning

item.title: Universal homology
item.description: New year; same me; new math. During the fall I said that I wanted to post on this blog monthly, but that did not happen for some reason. I thought I’d try again this semester, but maybe I am setting this not that high bar still too high for my self. For some reason there seems to be fewer hours in the day than it used to. The cover page for the post is generated by Dalle·2 using the prompt “A man finding the universal piece, old painting” – a true work of art.
